summary: Verified Reports page section headers and external payments display. All 5 sections correctly displayed with proper colors and columns.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Reports page section headers verified. All 5 sections working correctly with proper data display.

procurement_section_header.details: PROCUREMENT (Magnova → Nova PO) - Green header with 15 columns

payment_section_header.details: PAYMENT (Magnova → Nova) - Orange header with 6 columns for internal payments

payments_vendors_section_header.details: PAYMENTS (Nova → Vendors) - Purple header (NEW) with 7 columns for external payments

external_payments_data_display.details: External payment data (Payee Name, Payee Type=Vendor/CC, Amount) displays correctly in PAYMENTS (Nova → Vendors) section

internal_payments_data_display.details: Internal payment data displays correctly in PAYMENT (Magnova → Nova) section
